content: Dear Purple, I am deeply concerned about the recent covert malware attack on Blue's military bases near Green's borders. It is evident that Green poses a significant cyber threat. I request your cooperation in sharing intelligence on cyber threats to strengthen our collective defense against such attacks. Let us work together to ensure the security and stability of our nations. Regards, Blue

content: Dear Green, I am deeply concerned about the recent cyber attacks on Blue's military bases near your borders. These attacks pose a significant threat to our national security and stability in the region. I urge you to cease all hostile cyber activities and engage in open dialogue to address our shared concerns. Let us work together to prevent further escalation and promote peace. Regards, Blue
